meta_description: This is the complete rundown of everything you need to consider when hiring a firm to outsource your website development work. We address key ideas such as what risks to look out for, how much to pay, and important questions to ask.
title: 2021 Guide to Outsourcing Web Development
shortText: I’ve been outsourcing my web development to Scrumlaunch for nearly 4 years.
fullText:
I’ve been outsourcing my web development to Scrumlaunch for nearly 4 years.

I previously worked with a half dozen web development contractors and every relationship failed. I’ve learned a lot along the way, and this is my attempt to share my learnings with you so you don’t have to suffer through the same mistakes.

Not only have I saved hundreds of thousands of dollars in costs, but I’ve learned a lot about what makes a good web development company and how to maximize the return.

 

Outsourcing web development can be risky if you don’t know what to look for.

However, if you know how to use it effectively it will not only reduce your costs, but also will allow you to develop a more agile product, scale your capabilities faster, reduce the burden for hiring internally, and result in a superior product.

This guide will cover everything I’ve learned about outsourcing our web development over the last 4 years. If you’re seriously considering this approach, I encourage you to book a free time with Scrumlaunch to learn how they go about their process so you have something to compare it to when scouting other firms.

The high-level ideas I’ll address in this post are:

  • 4 (often overlooked) Advantages to Outsourcing Web Development
  • Risks of outsourcing your web development project
  • How much it costs to outsource web development
  • When to outsource vs. when to hire internally
  • How to Outsource Web Development Step-by-Step

 

The Biggest Advantages of Outsourcing Web Development

If you’re reading this article, you’re probably thinking, “Should I outsource my web development project?”

For most people, the answer to this question is a resounding yes. Here are the biggest advantages:

This guide will cover everything I’ve learned about outsourcing our web development over the last 4 years. If you’re seriously considering this approach, I encourage you to book a free time with Scrumlaunch to learn how they go about their process so you have something to compare it to when scouting other firms

 

1. Cost Savings

This is the most obvious answer, but it’s also the most important - and there are more cost-savings than meets the eye.

Of course, you will pay an hourly rate for outsourcing that is likely lower than what you’d pay for an internal software engineer. Most U.S.-based developers cost $200K+ per year. However, one cost component I hadn’t considered the benefit of was that outsourcing would eliminate my need to find, attract and hire talent internally.

Hiring internally is wicked expensive. And, it doesn’t always work out.

By outsourcing your project, you not only save on the cost of developing the project itself, but it’s incredibly easy to scale the number of developers on your team up or down as needed. The web development company takes the entire HR component off your plate, not only saving lots of time and money but also enabling you to reallocate that time to the project itself.

 

2. Scalability

I spoke to this advantage above from a cost perspective, but scaling a team on demand is crucial. Importantly, scaling can be done in either direction - up or down.

For example, perhaps you just thought of a new feature to build and you want to rush ship it in time for an important launch date. Your web development company should be able to easily scale the size of your team for the time required to meet that deadline. After the fire drill is over, you can scale back down to your normal size. We’ve done this at least a dozen times over the years with Scrumlaunch, and it’s crucial to our success.

 

3. Adaptability

When we first started building our company, we thought we should be a mobile app….

Spoiler alert: we were so wrong!

However, we were under this impression for at least 4 months. Had we hired internally instead of outsourcing at that time, we would have been stuck with a team of iOS and Android developers. For a number of reasons, this would have likely bankrupted the company.

Instead, once we identified why we were better off building a web app, we simply met with Scrumlaunch and restructured our entire team to build a ruby on rails web-first application.

We changed the direction of the entire project and company in minutes.

 

4. Rapid Develpoment Time

All the above advantages culminate in a key benefit: extremely efficient product development and launches.

Because the HR component to hiring and sourcing talent is taken care of, you can start immediately. Likewise, because costs are lower, you can easily pivot the project as needed and reduce development time.

We had our project live and running (with full registration functionality, video uploading/storage/hosting/streaming/etc, and other key features) in under 8 weeks. From there, we were off the races.

 

What are the risks of outsourcing web development?

There are thousands of web development companies to choose from all over the world, many of which come with a lot more risk than others.

There are a few things to look for that will dramatically reduce your risk, though.

First, if a web development company does not have an operational presence in the United States, then they are inherently riskier than shops based abroad (in my opinion). Generally, the most reliable companies I’ve seen are operated from the United States but write code abroad. You can rest easy knowing these companies are using US bank accounts, abide by our rules and regulations, and you’ll have more recourse options if you need them.

Additionally, if the company is not proficient in English then the project is doomed to fail from the start. Clear communication is crucial when outsourcing a web development project. Many of the subtle components of your projects will get lost in translation if you don’t have a native English speaker to relay information to.

Lastly, look for a good track record by asking to speak with some current clients. Happy clients are the biggest testament to the company’s product or service.

(That’s why me writing this post says a lot about Scrumlaunch :) )

You want to find a company that not only has a proven track record with multiple clients but also works in all areas of software development (e.g. Python, Ruby, Swift, etc.).

 

How much does it cost to outsource web development?

If you wanted to find developers for $5/hour, you probably could...and they’d likely suffer from all of the risks outlined above.

The cost is going to be dependent on a few factors. For example, iOS engineers are usually more expensive than python developers.

I think one of the biggest benefits of outsourcing is the ability to directly control and scale costs. If this is your first project, perhaps you just want one or two developers working on it to test out the relationship. The cost of the project will be directly proportional to the number of developers working on it. Therefore, you should be able to build whatever project you can imagine with whatever monthly budget you have in mind. The number of developers you allocate to it from the start will determine the speed at which it’s developed.

As a general rule of thumb, I wouldn’t hire an outsourced web development company unless it were saving me at least 70% of the cost of hiring internally.

 

When to Outsource vs. Hiring Internally

I think outsourcing is almost always the best path forward (especially for new projects that are still pivoting constantly), with a few exceptions.

Building Advanced Technologies

If you are building extremely advanced technology, like self-driving cars, you probably need a level of sophistication that is best suited for hiring internally.

Secretive projects

There may also be components of your project that you want to build internally because they are especially important. In that case, maybe you have an internal developer manage that piece of the project while you outsource the less important parts.

 

How to Hire an Outsourced Web Development Company

  1. Find web development companies that have a US presence, like Scrumlaunch
  2. Evaluate the company’s current project portfolio and look for similar projects to yours
  3. Speak with a few current clients that the company has
  4. Select your web development company
  5. You can start small with just a few developers to test your project, the relationship, and quality of work
  6. Scale as needed!

 

Hopefully this guide covered some new ideas and concepts for you. If you’re in the market for an outsourced web development company, I encourage you to book a consultation with Scrumlaunch to learn more about their different services and capabilities.

title: The  #1 Software Development Firm in Ukraine
shortText: Scrumlaunch is a U.S.-based software development firm with offices in the Ukraine. Our Kharkiv offices in Ukraine comprise more than 200 software developers and designers specializing in all types of website design and development, from ruby-on-rails to python to swift.
fullText:
Scrumlaunch is a U.S.-based software development firm with offices in the Ukraine. Our Kharkiv offices in Ukraine comprise more than 200 software developers and designers specializing in all types of website design and development, from ruby-on-rails to python to swift.

If you’re looking to hire software developers in Ukraine, Scrumlaunch is the premier software development firm in the region. We’ve worked with hundreds of companies, from seed-stage startups to venture-backed technology companies and full-fledged global corporations.

Our software engineers in Ukraine are highly skilled and vetted, and pass rigorous coding and English-language tests before joining our team.

If you’re looking for software development in Ukraine, we encourage you to book a free consultation with our team to learn how we’ve consistently built companies and products from inception to acquisition.

If you’re still in the research phase, we’ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions we often hear when people are researching Ukrainian software and website firms.

Frequently Asked Questions

What differentiates Scrumlaunch from other software developers in the Ukraine?

Although Scrumlaunch is based in Ukraine, we have operations in the United States and our owners are American entrepreneurs who have built and sold multiple businesses. We created Scrumlaunch to meet a demand for cost-effective but quality software engineering solutions for other like-minded business owners. Scrumlaunch manages a team of more than 200 software developers and designers in Ukraine, primarily in the city of Kharkiv, and other parts of Europe. We have yet to come across another firm in Ukraine that brings the benefits of Ukrainian software development in addition to the safety and security of a U.S.-based company.

Is it risky to outsource my software development to Ukraine?

If you are working with an unvetted or unproven firm, then working with a Ukrainian software development company can be risky if they do not have a U.S.-based operating model. We always encourage potential clients to speak with our current customers and current customers of any other firm you might be considering. If a Ukrainian software development company won’t allow you to speak with their current customers, steer clear of them! We would be happy to put you in touch with any of our clients so you can hear from there how seamless and beneficial it has been to outsource their website development to our offices in Ukraine, with supervision and management from the United States.

Is it cheaper to outsource my software development to Ukraine?

Yes. It should be significantly cheaper to outsource software development to Ukraine compared to using a strictly U.S.-based firm.

title: The  #1 Website Development Consultant in 2021
shortText: Scrumlaunch is a U.S.-based website development consulting firm with offices in Los Angeles, Austin, Kharkiv, and Portland.
fullText:
Scrumlaunch is a U.S.-based website development consulting firm with offices in Los Angeles, Austin, Kharkiv, and Portland.

We are renowned for the quality of our work, the variety of our customer portfolio, and our cost-effective solutions to all types of website development consulting projects.

We are an ideal solution for product-minded technology teams, startups or large corporations looking to accelerate their website development with a strategic outsourcing partner.

If you’re looking for a website development consultant, we encourage you to book a free consultation with our team to learn how we’ve consistently built companies and products from inception to acquisition.

If you’re still in the research phase, we’ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions we often hear when people are researching website development consulting firms.

Frequently Asked Questions

What differentiates Scrumlaunch from other Website Development Consultants?

Scrumlaunch manages a team of more than 200 website developers and designers around the world. Our scale and reach allow us to plug into any website development project regardless of how specific or unique of a skillset it requires. Most website development consultants can only service a specific piece of a project (design, for example) and many cannot support a project across all of its phases of evolution. As one of the premier website development consultants in North America, Scrumlaunch provides exceptional value across UI/UX design, software development, user research and product analytics, brand design, strategy, and other website-related consulting services.

Have any of the companies you’ve worked on been acquired?

We have built numerous platforms for founders that went on to sell their businesses. In fact, our firm was started out of the desire to provide entrepreneurs with a better and more cost-effective way to bring their technology ideas into reality. The fact that multiple of our clients went on to sell their businesses is a testament to the quality of our work and long-term strategic partnership approach. In addition to selling their businesses, our current portfolio of companies range from small boutique websites to large venture-backed companies. Few, if any, website development consultants have had the privilege of working with such a diverse set of clients with such an amazing set of outcomes.

What should I look for when hiring a website development consultant?

If you’d like to dive deeper into this topic, we encourage you to read our guide on outsourcing your website development. In short, we think there are a few crucial factors that you should take into consideration. First, we believe working with U.S.-based firms not only reduces your risk to fraudulent website consultants but also increases efficiency and reliability. In addition, working with a firm that is fluent in English is crucial for ensuring the business logic for each decision is not lost in translation (literally!). Lastly, you should prioritize firms that have the ability to scale with as your business grows.

Do you provide website design and development consulting services?

Yes! Scrumlaunch is a web design consultant as well as a web development consultant. After all, who better to build your website than the ones who designed it! We believe this vertical integration of web-related services also gives us a strategic advantage compared to other agencies. Many website design consultants cannot also develop a platform. Likewise, many website development consultants cannot design a platform. Scrumlaunch can do both, and a whole lot more!

title: Hire Quality Developers in Minutes - Deploy in Hours
shortText: Scrumlaunch is a U.S.-based website development firm specializing in web-based development, mobile applications, UI/UX design and prototyping, QA automation, and more.
fullText:
Scrumlaunch is a U.S.-based website development firm specializing in web-based development, mobile applications, UI/UX design and prototyping, QA automation, and more.

We make it extremely easy and enjoyable to hire developers across all types of programming languages and frameworks and scale your development team as needed.

Hiring developers can be painful. It’s often a multi-month process, costs a lot of money, and often doesn’t even result in the best-fit talent. Our team of more than 200 software developers and designers makes it easy to find the right developer for your project to reduce the time it takes to hire developers on your own.

How to Hire Developers with Scrumlaunch

1. Book a Free Consultation with Our Team

A seasoned expert will talk with you to learn about your project needs, timeline, budget, etc.

2. Meet potential project managers from our team

We’ll introduce you to a few project managers at Scrumlaunch who can lead your project to success

3. Hire Developers!

After assessing project requirements and selecting a project manager, we’ll immediately bring on any number of developers from our pool of 200 full-time developers. Voila! You’re hired developers.

If you’re looking to hire developers immediately, we encourage you to book a free consultation with our team to learn how we’ve consistently built companies and products from inception to acquisition.

Yes! Scrumlaunch is a web design consultant as well as a web development consultant. After all, who better to build your website than the ones who designed it! We believe this vertical integration of web-related services also gives us a strategic advantage compared to other agencies. Many website design consultants cannot also develop a platform. Likewise, many website development consultants cannot design a platform. Scrumlaunch can do both, and a whole lot more!

Frequently Asked Questions

What should I look for when hiring developers?

If you’re outsourcing the hiring of developers, then you need to prioritize a firm that has the capacity to scale with you as your needs evolve over time. Perhaps you want to hire more developers once your project is up and running, or create a mobile app to accompany your primary web app. In both instances, you’ll need to hire developers from a place that can accommodate these needs. Additionally, if you’re hiring developers from an overseas firm then you need to make sure they are proficient in English or that you can have a project manager to coordinate with.

Why should I hire developers with Scrumlaunch?

Scrumlaunch makes hiring developers easy and, more importantly, has the capacity to evolve alongside you and your project. Because we have over 200 developers and designers around the world, we can easily handle any and all project needs. Additionally, all developers and designers undergo rigorous vetting and training before joining our company, and every one of our clients gets a dedicated project manager to effectively managers all teammembers.

Can I hire developers for different types of programming languages and frameworks?

Absolutely! Scrumlaunch has specialized software development capabilities among the most popular web development languages and frameworks including python, ruby on rails, react, swift, etc.
